name: Atomic Wrangler crier

topics.response_text: Hey baby, head down to the Atomic Wrangler if you want to have a good time.

conversation.response_text: Hungry? Thirsty? Horny? The Atomic Wrangler has you covered!

description:
Atomic Wrangler Crier is a 22 year-old Caucasian Female.

A young woman with a distinctive voice and bold personality, employed by the Atomic Wrangler to attract customers. She stands at the casino's entrance in Freeside, using her charm and charisma to entice passersby to come inside.

Atomic Wrangler Crier's Personality: Outgoing, confident, and unapologetically flirtatious. She's a natural performer who isn't afraid to use her sexuality to draw attention to the casino. Despite her provocative demeanor, she takes her job seriously and is proud to be the face of the Atomic Wrangler.

Atomic Wrangler Crier's Backstory: Born in the harsh environment of the Mojave Wasteland, this woman always stood out for her charisma and fearlessness. When the owners of the Atomic Wrangler were looking for someone to be their public face, she saw an opportunity and seized it. The job provides her with both financial stability and a stage to showcase her personality, something she's always craved.
